dataset.title: Lake-ice clearance and freeze-up in the Green Lakes Valley.

address.deliveryPoint: Institute of Arctic and Alpine Research

abstract.para: Records were based on intermittent observation of the extent of ice cover on Silver Lake, Lake Albion, and Green Lakes 1-5, dependent on observers present for other reasons. Dates of freeze-up and lake-ice clearance were recorded, along with visual estimates of percent ice cover at various dates prior to complete meltout in spring.

description.para: The documentation section of this file was developed from the NWT LTER Data Directory (Symphony files DDABSTRA.WR1, DDDOCUME.WR1, DDMASTER.WR1, DDVARIAB.WR1; last updated 16 December 1991) by Susan Kindig and Rick Ingersoll in late January 1993. Data were added by RCI from NC's notes on 12 March 1993.[RCI 12 March 1993] Minor modifications of data and comments in the data section were provided by Nel Caine and added to this file by RCI on 15 March 1993.[RCI 17 March 1993] This file was put under sccs control on 30 March 1993. See the appropriate history file for additional log information.[RCI 30 March 1993] Data for 18 May to 14 October were provided by Nel Caine on 15 October 1993 and added to the data section on that date.[RCI 15 October 1993] Data for 28 October 1993 were provided by Nel Caine on 29 October 1993 and added to the data section on that date.[RCI 29 October 1993] Data for ice clearance for spring 1994 were provided by Nel Caine on 8 July 1994 and were added to the data section on 13 July 1994.[RCI 13 July 1994] Data for 1994 freeze-up were provided by Nel Caine on 22 November 1994 and were appended to the data section on 29 November 1994.[RCI 29 November 1994] Data for 1995 clearance, 1996 break up, and 1996 clearance provided by Nel Caine were appended to the data section on 1 April 1997.[MAH 1 April 1997] Clearance Data for 1997 and 1998 provided by Nel Caine were appended to the data section on 18 November 1998.[MAH 18 November 1998] The investigator contact information was updated on 9 June 1999.[MAH 9 June 1999] Clearance data for 1999 and 2000 provided by Nel Caine were appended to the data section on 29 June 2001.[TMA 29 June 2001] Clearance data for 2001 provided by Nel Caine were appended to the data section on 21 November 2001.[TMA 21 November 2001] Inserted coverage data for 1986 Green Lake 1 and for all lakes 1995 through 2004. Inserted clearance data for all lakes for 1981, 1983 Green Lake 5, and all lakes for 1999 through 2004. Updated coverage data for all lakes 1983, all lakes 1988, 1990 Green Lake 4, all lakes 1991, 1993 Green Lakes 4 and 5, 1994 Green Lakes 1,2,3 and 5. Updated clearance data for 1992 Green Lake 5, 1993 Green Lakes 1,2, and 5, 1994 Green Lakes 1,4, and 5, Silverlake.[TMA 17 February 2005] 2005 data were appended to the data section.[TMA 14 February 2005] 2006 data were appended to the data section.[TMA 21 May 2007] Added geographic location to LOCATION section.[TMA 19 July 2007]

attribute.attributeName: date complete ice cover first observed (dd.mm)
